name: Inspector Waffles
description:
Inspector Waffles is a point-and-click adventure game with detective mechanics.
Follow Inspector Waffles, a witty detective cat surrounded by crazy, stupid, dangerous, cunning and funny protagonists and solve who killed Fluffy, a rich industrial in CatTown. But since the Snowball's case, Inspector Waffles is not the same anymore ...
Features Cute pixel art point and click adventure game : interaction with decors, combining items and solving puzzles.
Play a smart cat detective in a game full of anthropomorphic cats and dogs... and maybe other species.
Look for clues, interrogate people and solve cases until you find out who is the crime head in Cat Town!
Beautiful jazzy soundtrack composed for the game.
Dry humour and puns about cats and dogs. I am not kitten.
